item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 20, 2023 Today's Verse Ephesians 2:8–9 [8] For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, [9] not a result of works, so that no one may boast. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves. John 14:6 - Jesus said to him, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life.
